data.title: The Legend of Zelda: Twilight Princess Similar Games
data.meta_description: The Legend of Zelda: Twilight Princess once again sees Link exploring the vast kingdom of Hyrule, this time in an attempt to dispel an evil twilight that has settled over the land.
data.text:
Fable Anniversary

February 4, 2014

X360

XBGS

PC

An Xbox 360 remastering of the original Fable game, including the extra (originally cut) content from Fable: The Lost Chapters. Released on February 4, 2014 in both boxed and digital forms.

The Legend of Zelda: Skyward Sword

November 18, 2011

Wii

WiiU

NSW

Link descends from his floating continent home to explore the dark and dangerous world below with the help of a magical sword, in this Wii installment of the Legend of Zelda series.

Dark Souls

September 22, 2011

X360

PS3

+ 5 more

XBGS

PC

XONE

PS4

NSW

A quasi-sequel to From Software's action-RPG Demon's Souls, set in a new universe while retaining most of the basic gameplay and the high level of challenge. It features a less-linear world, a new checkpoint system in the form of bonfires, and the unique Humanity system.

Okamiden

September 30, 2010

DS

This sequel to the critically acclaimed Okami returns players to the land of Nippon as the adorably pint-sized, yet still powerful Chibiterasu on a quest to save the land from certain doom at the hands of demons.

Enslaved: Odyssey to the West

October 5, 2010

X360

PS3

+ 3 more

XBGS

PS3N

PC

Enslaved: Odyssey to the West is an action adventure game developed by Ninja Theory and published by Namco-Bandai. A very loose retelling of "Journey to the West," Enslaved follows the story of Monkey and Trip as they attempt to cross a post-apocalyptic Planet Earth.

Darksiders

January 5, 2010

X360

PS3

+ 7 more

XBGS

PS3N

PC

WiiU

XONE

PS4

NSW

Developed by Vigil Games, Darksiders puts players in control of War, one of the Four Horsemen of the Apocalypse, as he attempts to find out who caused a premature Apocalypse while battling both Angels and Demons on a dead Earth.

Final Fantasy Crystal Chronicles: The Crystal Bearers

November 12, 2009

Wii

Abandoning the multiplayer co-op gameplay of previous games, The Crystal Bearers is a single-player action-adventure game telling the story of a persecuted race of "Crystal Bearers", capable of magic-like super-powers, trying to survive in a very conservative world.

Demon's Souls

February 5, 2009

PS3

PS3N

Demon's Souls is an action-RPG developed by From Software and released in 2009. It quickly became popular within hardcore circles for its relentlessly steep difficulty level, deep combat system, and unique multiplayer integration.

Prince of Persia: Rival Swords

April 3, 2007

PSP

Wii

Prince of Persia: The Two Thrones was later ported to the PSP and Wii. The result was titled Prince of Persia: Rival Swords. Motion controls added by the Wii version is the primary differentiation between the port and the original game.

Ōkami

April 18, 2006

PS2

PS3

+ 7 more

Wii

PS3N

PC

XONE

PS4

NSW

LUNA

Ōkami is an action-adventure game in which the goddess Amaterasu restores life and beauty to a world that has been taken over by malevolent beings through the power of celestial calligraphy techniques.

Prince of Persia: The Two Thrones

December 1, 2005

MAC

PS2

+ 4 more

GCN

XBOX

PS3N

PC

The Two Thrones is the third game and supposed end for the Sands Of Time saga. It follows the Prince's quest to finish the corrupted, power-hungry Vizier and his negative parts of his mind.

Kameo: Elements of Power

November 22, 2005

X360

XBGS

Kameo: Elements of Power is a third person platformer that tells the story a young elf Kameo, who must regain her Elemental Powers, defeat her corrupted sister Kalus and her accomplice evil Troll King Thorn.

Legend of Kay

March 4, 2005

PS2

DS

PS3N

A Zelda-like adventure in which an anthropomorphic cat named Kay must defend his peaceful home from a vicious invading army.

Prince of Persia: Warrior Within

November 30, 2004

PS2

GCN

+ 4 more

XBOX

PS3N

PC

IPHN

Prince of Persia: Warrior Within is the the second game in the Sands of Time series. Adopting a much darker tone, Warrior Within follows the Prince to the Island of Time as he attempts to change the past in order to end the Dahaka's relentless pursuit.

Fable

September 14, 2004

MAC

XBOX

+ 2 more

XBGS

PC

Fable is the first game in the Fable franchise, following the exploits of an unnamed Hero as he struggles to free Albion from the evil Jack Of Blades. Fable features a moral choice system, where your appearance changes depending on your actions.

Kya: Dark Lineage

November 14, 2003

PS2

After falling through a portal she discovered in her house, Kya is transported into a strange world. There, she encounters the Nativs, a tribe that is fighting against the evil Brazul and his minions. Can she help the Nativs in their fight and return safe to her world?

Dark Cloud 2

November 28, 2002

PS2

PS4

Control Max, a young inventor, and Monica, a warrior princess from the future, as they fight their way through dungeons and train rides to save the world.

Star Fox Adventures

September 23, 2002

GCN

Rare's last game for a major Nintendo console, Star Fox Adventures is an action-adventure game set in the Star Fox universe. Take control of ace pilot Fox McCloud as he searches for a way to save the aptly-named Dinosaur Planet from destruction.

Legacy of Kain: Blood Omen 2

March 21, 2002

PS2

GCN

+ 2 more

XBOX

PC

Released in 2002 for Xbox and Playstation 2, Blood Omen 2 answered many questions about Kain's rise to power while asking a few new ones.

Project Eden

October 22, 2001

PS2

PC

Project Eden is set in a dystopian future where humanity has built their cities on top of its older and now rotten past. A team of police agents are sent to investigate an incident in the Real Meat Packing company, where their case grows bigger as the investigation goes on.
